1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Bundle of expressions.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Bundle
6  ( -- * Bundle
7    Bundle (..), BundleMap,
8    NameDepth,
9    bundle,
10    startExpr,
11  ) where
12
13import qualified Data.Map.Strict                   as Ms
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Fn       as O
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Expr      as T
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.MinMax    as T
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Operator  as T
18
19
20-- | Bundle of named expressions.
21data Bundle as a = Bundle
22    { bundleExpr      :: [(O.Name, T.Expr as a)]
23    , bundleStart     :: T.Expr as a
24    , bundleSubmatch  :: [NameDepth]
25    } deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
26
27-- | Map version of expression bundle.
28type BundleMap as a = Ms.Map O.Name (T.Expr as a)
29
30-- | Submatch name and its depth level.
31--   Depth is incremented when entering repeatable expressions.
32--   Submatch of non-zero depth is collected in list.
33type NameDepth = (O.Name, Int)
34
35-- | Create bundle of subtext expressions.
36bundle :: [(O.Name, T.Expr as a)] -> Bundle as a
37bundle exprs =
38    Bundle { bundleExpr      = exprs
39           , bundleStart     = T.fail
40           , bundleSubmatch  = submatches exprs start }
41    where
42      start = startExpr exprs
43
44-- | The start expression of bundle.
45startExpr :: [(O.Name, T.Expr as a)] -> T.Expr as a
46startExpr ((_, e) : _)  = e
47startExpr []            = T.fail
48
49-- | List of submatch names.
50submatches :: [(O.Name, T.Expr as a)] -> T.Expr as a -> [NameDepth]
51submatches exprs start = Ms.assocs $ expr [] 0 start where
52    expr ns d (T.ERec e)               = rec ns d e
53    expr ns d (T.EBase (T.EChange n))  = ch ns d n
54    expr _ _ _                         = Ms.empty
55
56    ch ns d n | n `elem` ns        = Ms.empty
57              | otherwise          = case lookup n exprs of
58                                       Nothing -> Ms.empty
59                                       Just e  -> expr (n:ns) d e
60    rec ns d ex =
61        case ex of
62          T.EOr    es  -> Ms.unions (expr ns d <$> es)
63          T.ESeq   es  -> Ms.unions (expr ns d <$> es)
64          T.EAnd   es  -> Ms.unions (expr ns d <$> es)
65          T.ENot    e  -> expr ns d e
66          T.ERep  m e  | T.atMost 1 m  -> expr ns d e
67                       | otherwise     -> expr ns (d + 1) e
68          T.ELast   e  -> expr ns d e
69          T.ESub  n e  -> Ms.insertWith max n d $ expr ns d e
70          T.EAs   _ e  -> expr ns d e
71          T.EGath _ e  -> expr ns d e
72
73
